meta_info.name: CONTRIBUTION
meta_info.description: Documents a Contribution (change set) of one or more versions added to a change-controlled repository.

attributes.name: versions
attributes.description: Set of references to Versions causing changes to this EHR. Each contribution contains a list of versions, which may include paths pointing to any number of versionable items, i.e. items of types such as `COMPOSITION` and `FOLDER`.

attributes.name: audit
attributes.description: Audit trail corresponding to the committal of this Contribution.
